### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19084 (net: add comments on dns seed behaviour by ajtowns)
* #18925 (Add extra thread for scheduler, move TorControl and
~I'm not sure these warnings aren't false positive due to the Fedora clang's bug. See: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/19024#issuecomment-631935873~\n\n~So closing for now.~
An alternative would be to make the mutex recursive for now
> An alternative would be to make the mutex recursive for now\n\nThis won't compile, unfortunately.
